lead_paragraph: Basketball is in the blood of Danny Hurley, the first-year men’s coach at Wagner; his assistant Bobby Hurley, his brother; and their father, Bob Sr., the longtime coach at St. Anthony of Jersey City.
snippet: Basketball is in the blood of Danny Hurley, the first-year men’s coach at Wagner; his assistant Bobby Hurley, his brother; and their father, Bob Sr., the longtime coach at St. Anthony of Jersey City.
